summary: This is a retexture mod, it replaces the vanilla 256x256 mask and 512x512 hood textures with 1024x1024 for the masks and 2048 for the hood.
descriptionHtml:
[u][color=#ff0000][size=5][b]Description[/b][/size][/color][/u]

I always felt the textures of the Dragon Priest masks looked a bit low res,
so i made this retexture mod for the dragon priest masks.
it replaces the vanilla 256x256 mask and 512x512 hood textures with 1024x1024 for the masks and 2048 for the hood.

[color=#ff0000][size=5][u]Installation
[/u][/size][/color]You can just install it by dropping it in your data folder.
but I recommend using NMM or some other mod manager so it is easier to remove it in the future if you want.
author: poetie45
